;-----DRAGGABLE BSC PATHS-----
;
;----BASE NETWORK----
;
;--ORTHOGONAL (0x55600000)
0x55600000,1,0,0x00004b00,1,0=0x55600000,1,0,0x55600000,1,0
0x55600000,1,0,0x00004b00,3,0=0x55600000,1,0,0x55600000,1,0
0x55600000,3,0,0x00004b00,1,0=0x55600000,3,0,0x55600000,3,0
0x55600000,3,0,0x00004b00,3,0=0x55600000,3,0,0x55600000,3,0
;
;--ORTHOGONAL STUB (0x55600100)
0x55600000,1,0,0x00000300,1,0=0x55600000,1,0,0x55600100,1,0
0x55600000,1,0,0x00000300,3,1=0x55600000,1,0,0x55600100,1,0
0x55600000,3,0,0x00000300,1,0=0x55600000,3,0,0x55600100,3,1
0x55600000,3,0,0x00000300,3,1=0x55600000,3,0,0x55600100,3,1
;
;--90-DEGREE BEND (0x55600800)
0x55600000,1,0,0x00000f00,1,0=0x55600000,1,0,0x55600800,1,0
0x55600000,3,0,0x00000f00,1,0=0x55600000,3,0,0x55600800,1,0
0x55600000,1,0,0x00000f00,2,0=0x55600000,1,0,0x55600800,2,0
0x55600000,3,0,0x00000f00,2,0=0x55600000,3,0,0x55600800,2,0
0x55600000,1,0,0x00000f00,0,1=0x55600000,1,0,0x55600800,0,1
0x55600000,3,0,0x00000f00,0,1=0x55600000,3,0,0x55600800,0,1
0x55600000,1,0,0x00000f00,3,1=0x55600000,1,0,0x55600800,3,1
0x55600000,3,0,0x00000f00,3,1=0x55600000,3,0,0x55600800,3,1
;Adjacency
;To Orthogonal
0x55600800,0,0,0x00004b00,1,0=0x55600800,0,0,0x55600000,1,0
0x55600800,0,0,0x00004b00,3,0=0x55600800,0,0,0x55600000,3,0
0x55600800,1,1,0x00004b00,1,0=0x55600800,1,1,0x55600000,1,0
0x55600800,1,1,0x00004b00,3,0=0x55600800,1,1,0x55600000,3,0
0x55600800,2,1,0x00004b00,1,0=0x55600800,2,1,0x55600000,1,0
0x55600800,2,1,0x00004b00,3,0=0x55600800,2,1,0x55600000,3,0
0x55600800,3,0,0x00004b00,1,0=0x55600800,3,0,0x55600000,1,0
0x55600800,3,0,0x00004b00,3,0=0x55600800,3,0,0x55600000,3,0
;To Orthogonal Stub
;To 90-Degree Curve
;
;--+-INTERSECTION (0x55600900)
0x55600000,1,0,0x55601100,1,0=0x55600000,1,0,0x55600900,1,0
0x55600000,1,0,0x55601100,3,0=0x55600000,1,0,0x55600900,1,0
0x55600000,3,0,0x55601100,1,0=0x55600000,3,0,0x55600900,3,0
0x55600000,3,0,0x55601100,3,0=0x55600000,3,0,0x55600900,3,0
; > Adjacencies
; >--Orthogonal--
0x55600900,0,0,0x00004b00,1,0=0x55600900,0,0,0x55600000,1,0
0x55600900,0,0,0x00004b00,3,0=0x55600900,0,0,0x55600000,1,0
0x55600900,1,0,0x00004b00,1,0=0x55600900,1,0,0x55600000,1,0
0x55600900,1,0,0x00004b00,3,0=0x55600900,1,0,0x55600000,1,0
0x55600900,2,0,0x00004b00,1,0=0x55600900,2,0,0x55600000,3,0
0x55600900,2,0,0x00004b00,3,0=0x55600900,2,0,0x55600000,3,0
0x55600900,3,0,0x00004b00,1,0=0x55600900,3,0,0x55600000,3,0
0x55600900,3,0,0x00004b00,3,0=0x55600900,3,0,0x55600000,3,0
; >--Orthogonal Stub--
; >--90-Degree Bend--
; > Road Crosswalk
0x55600900,2,0,0x00020700,0,0=0x55600900,2,0,0x55601100,2,0
0x55600900,3,0,0x00020700,0,0=0x55600900,3,0,0x55601100,2,0
0x55600900,2,0,0x00020700,1,0=0x55600900,2,0,0x55601100,2,0
0x55600900,3,0,0x00020700,1,0=0x55600900,3,0,0x55601100,2,0
0x55600900,0,0,0x00020700,2,0=0x55600900,0,0,0x55601100,0,0
0x55600900,1,0,0x00020700,2,0=0x55600900,1,0,0x55601100,0,0
0x55600900,0,0,0x00020700,3,0=0x55600900,0,0,0x55601100,0,0
0x55600900,1,0,0x00020700,3,0=0x55600900,1,0,0x55601100,0,0
; > Path +-Intersection
0x55600900,0,0,0x55601100,0,0=0x55600900,0,0,0x55600900,0,0
0x55600900,0,0,0x55601100,2,0=0x55600900,0,0,0x55600900,2,0
0x55600900,0,0,0x55601100,3,0=0x55600900,0,0,0x55600900,3,0
0x55600900,1,0,0x55601100,0,0=0x55600900,1,0,0x55600900,0,0
0x55600900,1,0,0x55601100,2,0=0x55600900,1,0,0x55600900,2,0
0x55600900,1,0,0x55601100,3,0=0x55600900,1,0,0x55600900,3,0
0x55600900,2,0,0x55601100,0,0=0x55600900,2,0,0x55600900,0,0
0x55600900,2,0,0x55601100,1,0=0x55600900,2,0,0x55600900,1,0
0x55600900,2,0,0x55601100,2,0=0x55600900,2,0,0x55600900,2,0
0x55600900,3,0,0x55601100,0,0=0x55600900,3,0,0x55600900,0,0
0x55600900,3,0,0x55601100,1,0=0x55600900,3,0,0x55600900,1,0
0x55600900,3,0,0x55601100,2,0=0x55600900,3,0,0x55600900,2,0
; > Path T-Intersection
;--PATH T-INTERSECTION (0x55600A00)--
0x55600000,1,0,0x55601180,1,0=0x55600000,1,0,0x55600A00,1,0
0x55600000,1,0,0x55601180,1,1=0x55600000,1,0,0x55600A00,1,1
0x55600000,1,0,0x55601180,3,0=0x55600000,1,0,0x55600A00,3,0
0x55600000,1,0,0x55601180,3,1=0x55600000,1,0,0x55600A00,3,1
0x55600000,3,0,0x55601180,1,0=0x55600000,3,0,0x55600A00,1,0
0x55600000,3,0,0x55601180,1,1=0x55600000,3,0,0x55600A00,1,1
0x55600000,3,0,0x55601180,3,0=0x55600000,3,0,0x55600A00,3,0

;

0x55600000,1,0,0x00005700,1,1=0x55600000,1,0,0x55600A00,1,1
0x55600000,1,0,0x00005700,3,0=0x55600000,1,0,0x55600A00,3,0

;
; > Adjacencies
; >--Orthogonal--
0x55600A00,1,0,0x00004b00,1,0=0x55600A00,1,0,0x55600000,1,0
0x55600A00,1,0,0x00004b00,3,0=0x55600A00,1,0,0x55600000,3,0

; >--Orthogonal Stub--
;
; >--90-Degree Bend
;

0x55600A00,0,1,0x00000f00,1,0=0x55600A00,0,1,0x55600800,1,0

0x55600A00,1,0,0x55601100,0,0=0x55600A00,1,0,0x55600900,0,0
